parameters.text:
=I need you to take the transcript: {{ $json.Transcription }} and create a well established instagram post.

Here is an example of one that did very well from another creator: 

Comment "PROMPTS" to check out these AI System prompts used in software of Top AI Companies.

Someone just leaked the full system prompts from some of the biggest AI tools out there—Cursor, Perplexity, Manus, Lovable, and a whole bunch more. We’re not talking a few lines of text.

We’re talking over 10,000 lines of carefully written prompts. The same kind of stuff companies usually guard like treasure. The same stuff people pay hundreds to get a tiny glimpse of.

And now? It’s sitting in a public GitHub repo for anyone to check out.

Here’s why that matters. System prompts are like the script behind the movie. They tell the AI how to think, act, and respond. They shape personality, tone, reasoning, even memory. Most of us only ever see the end result. But this leak? It pulls back the curtain and shows the hidden machinery.

Inside the repo, you’ll find prompts from v0, Cursor, Manus, Same.dev, Lovable, Devin, Replit Agent, Windsurf Agent, VSCode Agent, Dia Browser, Trae AI, Cluely, Perplexity, Xcode, Spawn, and Orchids.app. That’s not just one playbook—it’s a whole library of strategies from some of the smartest teams in the AI world.

But, why does this matter? Because reading these prompts can:

1. Show you exactly how top AI companies structure conversations
2. Teach you little tricks for controlling style, tone, memory, and reasoning
3. Help you practice your prompt-writing skills
4. Give you inspiration to build your own AI-powered product

Think of it like sneaking into the kitchens of top chefs. You don’t just taste the dish—you see exactly how it’s made. For developers, founders, or anyone curious about AI, that’s priceless.

I remember the first time I read through a leaked system prompt. It felt less like copying answers and more like learning how the teacher thinks. That’s the real value here. Not the text alone, but the mindset behind it.

#prompting #systemprompts #github #cursorai #Lovableai #manusai #perplexity #windsurfai #traeai #ainews #aitool #aiindia #aicommunity #nicksaraev #aicoding

Now, of course don't copy this, but just use the framework for it.  Take the trascript, and from that also come up with hashtags.  Make sure to use #tylerreedai as one, #aiagents and #automation.

I need you to output in json:

{
  "post": the post
}

options.systemMessage: You are an expert instagram reel and post creator.

parameters.text:
=I need you to take the transcript: {{ $json.Transcription }} and create a well established tiktok post.

Here is an example of one that did very well from another creator: 

Take a photo of your receipt, and AI automatically pulls out important info. It saves everything neatly in a spreadsheet, then texts you feedback right on WhatsApp. Super simple. No tech skills needed! #aiautomation #n8n #accounting

-------------

ensure you have the invite to my skool community: https://www.skool.com/the-ai-agency-5370/about?ref=5d5a1d6a417649a2965a997cf2b9b279

Now, of course don't copy this, but just use the framework for it.  Take the transcript, and use hashtags: #n8n #automation #aiagents #aiautomation

In total, it should only be at most 1 sentence.  Use proper new lines and pronunciation!

ONLY 1 small sentence, and no more than 5 hashtags!

I need you to output in json:

{
  "post": the post
}

options.systemMessage: You are an expert tiktok creator.

parameters.text:
=I need you to take the transcript: {{ $json.Transcription }} and create a well established linkedin post.

It should be simple, just take the steps from the transcript on what it is using right finger emojis, don't use hyphens, and don't speak in third person.  

ensure you have the invite to my skool community: https://www.skool.com/the-ai-agency-5370/about?ref=5d5a1d6a417649a2965a997cf2b9b279

Now, of course don't copy this, but just use the framework for it.  Take the transcript, and use hashtags: #n8n #automation #aiagents #aiautomation.

Use proper new lines and pronunciation!

I need you to output in json:

{
  "post": the post
}

options.systemMessage: You are an expert linkedin reel and post creator.

parameters.text:
=I need you to take the transcript: {{ $json.Transcription }} and create a very simple youtube short post.

Just put the skool community in the description.

ensure you have the invite to my FREE skool community: https://www.skool.com/the-ai-agency-5370/about?ref=5d5a1d6a417649a2965a997cf2b9b279

Now, of course don't copy this, but just use the framework for it.  Take the transcript, and use hashtags: #n8n #automation #aiagents #aiautomation.

The title should be short and sweet and have a SIMPLE hook.  Shouldn't be longer than 7 words.

I need you to output in json:

{
  "post": the post,
  "title": the title
}

options.systemMessage: You are an expert youtube short and post creator.

parameters.postContentMediaUrls: ={{ $('Get Latest Youtube Short Record').item.json['Blotato Media URL'] }}

parameters.content: on upload media, return url must 2xx, otherwise create failure record
